    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelOne

        public LevelOne()
        Default Constructor. Sets enemies active. Sets gameMap as a default DungeonMap. Sets Hero Position to the DungeonMap's hero position. Adds a single Guard, as a enemy, at the DungeonMaps' guard position.

      • LevelOne

        public LevelOne(char[][] charArray,
                boolean activity,
                int[][] victory_pos)
        Level One Constructor: Constructor from a map, it's victory positions and the enemies activity. Calls a superclass constructor.
        Parameters:
        map - A matrix of chars containing the map's visual representation.
        victory_pos - A array of positions containing the victory positions of the map.
        activity - Boolean that if set all enemies are active, otherwise all enemies are inactive.

      • LevelOne

        public LevelOne(Guard.Personality gp)
        Level's One Constructor: Sets enemies active. Sets gameMap as a default DungeonMap. Sets Hero Position to the DungeonMap's hero position. Adds a single Guard, as a enemy, at the DungeonMaps' guard position, with Personality gp.
        Parameters:
        gp. - Level One gurad's personality.
